answers.answer: They told me I could have one egg if I couldn't make it through sickness but its not bad its like a mini soda bottle either orange or strawberry maybe even a better flavor at different docs its not overly sweet or bad at all and I expected the worse
I ate late at night the night before and had to drink it an hr before my appt.  I made my appt as early as possible and took a snack with me for after . Everything was fine thooo.  Goodluck
I didn't have to fast for mine, but they gave me a red drink it was fruit punch flavored and then after your done drinking it they will draw your blood in one hour

question: I'm going for my first Glucose test next week at 17 weeks because my mother had gestational diabetes and I'm already high risk of preeclampsia! They want me to do it ASAP.But what I want to know we have to fast from the night before, and can't have anything to eat until the test is done with. When I wake in the morning I have to eat otherwise I feel so sick, how did you ladies do it? I hope I will be able to cope lol.
title: Ladies that have done the Glucose test!
